answers.author: Bogdan Vitas
answers.text:
You should check with a few local recruiters in California as a good source of information.  I have a few that I have obtained in that manner.  My suggestion is that you spend a sufficient amount of time flushing out a final evaluation form.  It is critical that both those doing the evaluation and those being evaluated have a clear understanding of the document and its intended purpose.
